Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.placeables

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.placeables.PlaceableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.cards.placeables.GoldCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoldCard extends PlaceableCard implements Serializable
Are a type of PlaceableCard that can be placed in the board. If the player wants to put down this card facing upwards he needs to make sure that the required resources are present in the play area.

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int id, Symbol tr, Symbol tl, Symbol br, Symbol bl, Resource resource, int points, PlacementPointsStrategy pointsStrategy, Map<Symbol,Integer> price, boolean isGoldCard)
      Constructs a new GoldCard object of the specified resource type, identified by id, with the specified symbols in the corners. Also, the GoldCard object will have an instance of a child of PlacementPointsStrategy, and for every iteration of this accomplishment the card will give the specified amount of points.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier of the card
      tr - the symbol in the top right corner of the card's front
      tl - the symbol in the top left corner of the card's front
      br - the symbol in the bottom right corner of the card's front
      bl - the symbol in the bottom left corner of the card's front
      resource - the resource the card belongs to
      points - the amount of points given to the player assuming the condition shown on the card is accomplished a single time

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(GoldCard other)
      Constructs a copy of another GoldCard.
      Parameters:
      other - the GoldCard that is being copied
